description:
My place is located in the exciting, and vibrant neighborhood of Prospect Park near fantastic restaurants and bars, such as Barboncino Pizza, Franklin Park, Chavela's, and The Crown Inn, as well as attractions like the Brooklyn Museum, Prospect Park, Grand Army Plaza, and the Brooklyn Library.  Easy to travel around Brooklyn and to Manhattan from the Franklin Ave. Subway Stop (2,3,4,5 trains), located 2 blocks away. You’ll love my place because of the coziness and spacious living area.

Hardwood floors, TV available for use with chrome cast (no cable), dining room table, 2 bedrooms with windows and comfortable double beds, fully stocked kitchen

you'll be able to access our entire apartment

Prospect heights is full of delicious restaurants and fun bars.  We're a 10 minute walk from Prospect Park and Park Slope.

Our apartment is 2 blocks from the Franklin Avenue Subway Stop, which easily provides access to the east and west sides of Manhattan by way of the 2,3,4, and 5 trains.
name: Cozy Prospect Heights 2 bedroom
